title: General Excise Tax Law

penalty Cross References Tax collection; mainland contractors working on federal construction projects, see ยง231-9.3. Law Journals and Reviews Taxes in Hawaii since July 1, 1968: A Report on the Unreported Decisions of Judge Dick Yin Wong, Arthur B. Reinwald, 9 HBJ 95. Taxes in Hawaii 1983-1988: A Funny Thing Happened at the Forum. 22 HBJ 53. Hawaii&rsquo;s General Excise Tax Law: A Comprehensive Review of the Decisions. II HBJ No. 13, at pg. 1. Case Notes Value of management and administrative services taxpayer provided to its wholly owned subsidiaries was taxable under this chapter. 6 H. App. 260, 718 P.2d 1122. Where plaintiff was a &ldquo;retailer&rdquo; licensed under this chapter, used the goods in Hawaii after it purchased and imported them from the mainland &ldquo;for purposes of resale&rdquo;, it was liable for the use tax under this section. 128 H. 116, 284 P.3d 209 (2012).
